entry.title: BLUG Meeting & Guest in Town - Bruce Rogers
entry.summary:
Welcome to Bruce Rogers from Provo Utah, who works as a software engineer in SUSE. Since graduating from San Diego State in 1987, Bruce has worked in the computer industry, first doing software testing, then development for NetWare, including kernel development as they Paravirtualized NetWare for running under Xen. For the past 7 years, he has worked on Xen and QEMU. He has 4 children including an adopted chinese daughter.

On the event, Bruce will make a short presentation on virtualization for about 30 minutes. Then have free talks with us on technology and any other topics.

entry.title: 2015 Software Freedom Day (软件自由日)
entry.summary:
软件自由日(Software Freedom Day，SFD)是一个关于自由软件和开源软件的全球性庆祝活动。从2006年开始，定于每年9月的第三个星期六举行。其目的是向公众推广和宣传自由/开源软件。2015 软件自由日清华站将由北京 GNU/Linux 用户组与 清华大学 TUNA 协会携手举办。

Software Freedom Day (SFD) is an annual worldwide celebration of Free Software. SFD is a public education effort with the aim of increasing awareness of Free Software and its virtues, and encouraging its use. SFD 2015 (Tsinghua Station) will be hold together by Beijing GNU/Linux User Group and TsingHua TUNA community.

Time & Location

  • Date & Time: Sept. 19,(Sat) 14:00 - 17:00
  • Location: Tsinghua University, Xinshui 300 清华大学, 新水300
  • Traffic:
    • 清华东路西口公交站/地铁宇宙中心站 -> 清华东门 -> 清华主楼左拐 -> 二校门右拐 -> 靠右走200米，接近大礼堂处右拐
    • 清华园公交站 -> 清华南门 -> 蒙民伟音乐厅左拐 -> 二校门右拐 -> 靠右走200米，接近大礼堂处右拐
  • Map: OpenStreetMap

Topics:

entry.title: BLUG Meeting (July 2015) - Red Programming Language
entry.summary:
Nenad Rakocevic will tell us about his programming language "red".

Red is a homoiconic language similar to Rebol. It is a "full stack programming language" which can be used for extremely high-level programming (DSLs and GUIs) as well as low-level programming (operating systems and device drivers).

We will also discuss what our new website should be like. Welcome every one join this discussion.
